dhp414:1: Yomaṃ → yo imaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp414:3: pāraṅgato → pāragato (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp416:9: tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ → idaṃ gāthādvayaṃ (416–417) videsapotthakesu sakideva dassitaṃ
dhp423:38: ṭhārasa → buddhe caṭṭhārasa bhave (bj); soḷasa (sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp423:40: ṭhārasa → buddhe caṭṭhārasa bhave (bj); soḷasa (sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed)
